newsitem.title: ISRAEL: El Al Israel Airlines appoints new president.
newsitem.headline: El Al Israel Airlines appoints new president.

text.p: Joel Feldschuh, a retired brigadier general in the Israel Air Force, was appointed president of El Al Israel Airlines at a special meeting of the company's board of directors, the airline announced.
Feldschuh, 47, was president of Champion Motors Inc, the importers of Volkswagen, Audi and Seat cars in Israel, since 1994.

He also served as president of Edunetics Ltd, a software development company. In the airforce he served as an F-15 pilot as well as in senior positions as base commander, and intelligence officer during the Gulf War.
Feldschuh will replace Rafi Harlev, who served as El Al president for 14 years and recently resigned.
State-owned El Al, Israel's national airline, operates 26 Boeing aircraft with scheduled flights to 55 destinations.
